00027  * @brief  Abstract base class for objects that transform intensity data.
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _INTENSITYTRANSFORMER_H_
00030 #define _INTENSITYTRANSFORMER_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/AptTypes.h"
00034 //
00035 #include <cstring>
00036 #include <string>
00037 //
00038 
00039 /**
00040  *  IntensityTransformer - Abstract base class for objects that transform
00041  * intensity data.  
00042  */
00043 class IntensityTransformer {
00044 
00045 public:
00046 
00047   /** 
00048    * @brief Virtual destructor for a virtual class.
00049    */
00050   virtual ~IntensityTransformer() {}
00051 
00052   /** 
00053    * @brief transform the intensity point supplied coming from a particular
00054    * probe in a particular microarray.
00055    * 
00056    * @param probeIx - Probe index from the cel file.
00057    * @param chipIxs - Set of chip indexes from same sample.
00058    * @param intensity - Original intensities.
00059    * @param return - Transformed intensities.
00060    */
00061   virtual float transform(int probeIx, int chipIx, float intensity) = 0;
00062   
00063   /** 
00064    * @brief What is the name of the transformer?
00065    * @return name of transformer.
00066    */
00067   virtual std::string getType() { return m_Type; }
00068 
00069 protected:
00070   /// String description of our type.
00071   std::string m_Type;
00072   
00073 };
00074 
00075 #endif /* _INTENSITYTRANSFORMER_H_ */
